DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether increase dose local anesthetic ( lidocaine ) increase duration peripheral nerve block ( adductor canal block ) develop model assess duration peripheral nerve blockade . The investigator hypothesize increase dose lidocaine ( increased concentration ) increase duration adductor canal block . The study follow identical study ( SM1-PJ-13 , EudraCT number : 2013-001822-24 ) make earlier different concentration lidocaine placebo group . For information see trial registration European Union Drug Regulatory Authorities Clinical Trial System .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Different Doses ( Mass ) Local Anesthetic Duration Adductor Canal Block Healthy Volunteers - Part 2
DOC.criteria: ASA 1 Body mass index 1825 Allergy study medication Earlier trauma surgery low limb Diabetes Mellitus
